title: P2P Advertiser Adverts (request)
description: Returns all P2P adverts created by the authorized client. Can only be used by a registered P2P advertiser.

limit.description: [Optional] Used for paging. This value will also apply to subsription responses.

offset.description: [Optional] Used for paging. This value will also apply to subsription responses.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
